region: string - body region (e.g., neck, shoulder_left, shoulder_right, lower_back)
posture_angle_deg: float - degrees from neutral posture (positive = more forward flexion)
activity_label: enum {low_tension, moderate_tension, high_tension} - coarse bucket for analytics
